message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you like the product, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $120. How about we meet at $140?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $160, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above $140. How about we meet at $145?
